h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: When he runs out of health, you won't get the traditional "boss defeated" scene, and only earn some Will as the Macaque Chief retreats, turns invisible, and runs off toward the ruins above while taunting you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
When he runs out of health, you won't get the traditional "boss defeated" scene, and only earn some Will as the Macaque Chief retreats, turns invisible, and runs off toward the ruins above while taunting you.
